title: Harold Chapman (rugby league)
text:
Harold Chapman was a professional <a href="rugby%20league">rugby league</a> footballer who played in the 1920s and 1930s. He played at club level for <a href="Castleford%20Tigers">Castleford</a> (<a href="List%20of%20Castleford%20Tigers%20players">Heritage №</a>), as a , i.e. number 2 or 5.
Playing career.
County League appearances.
Harold Chapman played in <a href="Castleford%20Tigers">Castleford</a>'s victory in the <a href="RFL%20Yorkshire%20League">Yorkshire</a> <a href="Rugby%20league%20county%20leagues">County League</a> during the <a href="1932%E2%80%9333%20Northern%20Rugby%20Football%20League%20season">1932–33 season</a>.
Club career.
Harold Chapman played in <a href="Castleford%20Tigers">Castleford</a>'s defeat by <a href="Dewsbury%20Rams">Dewsbury</a> in the 1929 <a href="Challenge%20Cup">Challenge Cup</a> <a href="Single-elimination%20tournament">semi-final</a> during <a href="1928%E2%80%9329%20Northern%20Rugby%20Football%20League%20season%23Challenge%20Cup">1928–29 season</a>.
